markdownRemark.excerpt: This is huge… very huge. It has the potential to take Linux to the next level - not just by creating a faster linux. No. I believe, like OSX, it can lead to the…
markdownRemark.html:
This is huge… very huge. It has the potential to take Linux to the next level - not just by creating a faster linux. No.

I believe, like OSX, it can lead to the next generation app development infrastructure - by leveraging the VM,  true platform independence and freedom from glibc hell.

frontmatter.title: IPV4 space shrinks to 5% - final internet address blocks to be allocated in 2011
China's nVidia GPU supercomputer is world's fastest
